nodes.text: Cham Detta was a male Human Mandalorian, the brother of Suvar Detta, and a member of the Mandalorian Protectors. Along with his brother, he was trained by Boba Fett as the new generation of Mandalorian Supercommandos. During the time of the Second Galactic Civil War, Cham was the bartender of the Oyu'baat tapcaf in Keldabe. He was present when Jaina Solo confronted Gotab about his past as a Jedi in the tapcaf and later he served drinks at the celebration of Mirta Gev's marriage to Ghes Orade.
